title: Cuts You Up
description: 1990: Cassandra and her two best friends went out for the night of their lives—a heavy metal concert in the city. But they never made it to their destination. Their plans changed when they stumbled into the home of The Huntsman—the nearly-mythical killer who has been terrorizing their small town for years.By morning Cassandra was the only one left alive.Now, thirty years later Cassandra is a successful writer with a devoted fanbase. She has worked hard to put the memories of that horrible night behind her, while keeping the rest of the world at arm's length. But when her publisher insists on a publicity tour for her latest book, her worst fears are confirmed. Some people don't want to let her forget about her past. And one person is taking his obsession with the murders too far...
author: David   Blackwood
